titleStmt.title: Zerubbabels encouragement to finish the temple. A sermon preached before the honourable House of Commons, at their late solemne fast, Apr. 27. 1642. By Tho. Goodwin, B.D. Published by order from that House.
titleStmt.author: Goodwin, Thomas, 1600-1680.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached at the late fast before the Commons House of Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
